channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report E-2025010372
item.description:
Report E-2025010372

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-15
  • City: SOUTHINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: When unloading freight from trailer material handler discover a pail that had leaked its contents from the lid closure due to heavy freight being loaded on top of it. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the crushed pail.
